image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Oregon; born in McMinniville, Oreg., December 12, 1956; graduated Dayton Union High School; A.A., Chemeketa Community College, 1977; B.A., NW Nazarene College, 1979; 2nd lieutenant, Oregon National Guard Reserve; member, State senate, 1987-1995, GOP whip 1990-1995; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourth Congress (January 3, 1995-January 3, 1997); was an unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Fifth Congress.

researchRecord.name: 1996, 36 photographs.
researchRecord.description: The photos show images from a television advertisement from the congressional campaign of Jim Bunn of Oregon.
